mineclonia.short_description: Survival sandbox game inspired by Minecraft.

asuna.short_description: A vibrant world of beautiful biomes. Explore, discover, create.

capturetheflag.short_description: Two or more teams battle to snatch and return the enemy flags, before the enemy takes their own!

mesecraft.short_description: Work in Progress. The best game for Minetest. A survival game with new depth, mechanics, biomes, mobs and many essential additions. Has a focus on being fun, user-friendly, stable, and minimalist but featured.

reject.short_description: Simply reject all login attempts and show them a message

tolkientest.short_description: Work in Progress. A fork of LOTT with a ton of new content

blank.short_description: Absolute blank template to start your projects from.

libre_adventure3.short_description: Minecraft golden age clone with improvements

ghost_crypt.short_description: Steal the treasure while avoiding ghosts.

modular_portals.short_description: Explore a strange hall filled with portals

shadow_forest.short_description: The forest has been overrun by the Shadows who’ve cursed it with eternal darkness. You’re the Wizard of Light; you’re the only hope to break the curse.

lazarr.short_description: Work in Progress. Be a pirate and solve laser puzzles (UNFINISHED!)

mineclone2.short_description: Survive, farm, build, explore, play with friends, and do much more. Inspired by Minecraft, pushing beyond.

glitch.short_description: You’re lost in cyberspace. Collect electrons, unlock new sectors and find your destination

epic_combat.short_description: Fight your enemies with various weapons and protect yourself with distinct sets of Armour, whilst sharpening your skills in PVP and PVE.

slide_space.short_description: Choose your direction wisely. A simple puzzle game.

nonsensical_skyblock.short_description: skyblock game BASED on crafting. no quest cringe! bonemeal go brrrr

newplanet.short_description: You're on a strange planet, with 8 exciting biomes and a perpetual night, but beware, there are monsters ready to hunt you!

regulus_mtgamejam_2023.short_description: Recover the crystal and bring light back into the world

regulus_mtgj2024.short_description: Darkness has come upon the world. Can you find the spell to banish it?

ksurvive.short_description: Work in Progress. A game that changes much of MTG's gameplay.

yams.short_description: Work in Progress. An MTG fork with light RPG elements.

minefall.short_description: Fight, farm, explore, build. Solo or multiplayer.

ketchupland.short_description: Work in Progress. A game with tomatoes, ketchup, and mese.

wyrm_cube.short_description: Find the Wyrm Cubes and save yourself! Inspired by an 80's anime.

luckysweeper.short_description: Proof of concept of a minesweeper game using the MTE.

luckydude.short_description: Can you guess which cube to hit last?

no_mans_land.short_description: Work in Progress. Survive No Man's Land, where TNT rains from the sky, and destroys everything. This is a Work in Progress, I wanna add more features & lore

nodeverse.short_description: Work in Progress. A procedurally generated space exploration game

nodecore.short_description: Discover and invent in a surreal, unsympathetic world of cubes, patterns, and abstractions.

piranesi_redo.short_description: Discover the secrets of the space-bending house, in this polished remake of iarbat's award-winning original game.

nodecore_alpha.short_description: Early-access edition of NodeCore with latest features (and maybe bugs)

snake_3d.short_description: The classical Snake game extended to 3 dimensions.

qiskitblocks.short_description: Teaching Quantum Computing using Qiskit in a block world

balloonair.short_description: A hot air balloon game created for the 2021 Minetest GAME JAM.

sokoblox_game.short_description: A rolling block puzzle game in Luanti.

alter.short_description: A challenging puzzle game in a dystopian future.

cellestial_game.short_description: Game of Life in three dimensions.

what_were_you_expecting.short_description: An interactive rpg game with a fun ending.

farlands_reloaded.short_description: lightweight game to explore and create

ul_game.short_description: A tiny rogue-inspired game with machiavellian sandbox elements

block_assault.short_description: A first person shooter game with multiple features

block_assault_mapmaker.short_description: This game is focused to make maps for BlockAssault [BA.S]

etb.short_description: A dark survival hunt where you challenge a relentless Beast. Fight back before the world falls into darkness. "Hunt or be Hunted."

lordofthetest.short_description: LOTR-inspired subgame. Explore the world of Middle-Earth, the one subgame to rule them all!

xaenvironment.short_description: A game that aims to contain lots of environments and things.

turtlebots_classroom.short_description: A game with only turtlebots, to prevent kids from getting distracted by other blocks.

veil_of_the_unknown.short_description: Experience a world of complete blindness. Try you best to survive without the gift of sight.

runorfall.short_description: Like TNT run. Run on a platform as blocks fall down behind you, last one to fall down wins!

notactuallythebareminimum.short_description: Very little content base game so you can build off it. Totally permissive, you can relicense it or do whatever.

invector.short_description: A karting game with built in track editor

torrlund.short_description: Your ship has crashed, armed with a few tools you must harvest meteorites to repair your ship while fighting off hordes of aliens

100_minerals_to_success.short_description: Mine Minerals, Craft Pickaxes and dig deeper! Mine all 100 Minerals and beware of hazards!

build_n_buy.short_description: A game inspired by Minecraft Championship's Build Mart, where you have to replicate mini build and to get the materials for them, you have to go 'shopping'.

cement.short_description: A craftable and “makeable“ cement blocks for Minetest Game

trowel.short_description: Vertically modify adjacent nodes of the same type with a single click.

uniham.short_description: Various hammers that can be used to crush nodes.

hunger_ng.short_description: A very customizable and easy to extend hunger system.

hexagonal.short_description: Proof of concept for hexagonal nodes

worldedit.short_description: In-game world editor. Use it to repair griefing, or just create awesome buildings in seconds.

nuke.short_description: Additional types of TNT for all your explosive needs.

farming.short_description: Adds many plants and food to Minetest

real_torch.short_description: Realistic torches that go out eventually and drop in water

falling_item.short_description: Tweak falling blocks to add custom controls

stairs.short_description: Adds more stair types to Minetest.

nssm_extra.short_description: Even more creatures to add into your worlds

bonemeal.short_description: Adds bone and bonemeal giving the ability to quickly grow plants and saplings.

mobs_slimes.short_description: Add green and lava slimes to your world.

wine.short_description: Adds wine barrel to ferment different foods into drinks.

cblocks.short_description: Adds coloured wood, glass and stone blocks.

sfinv_home.short_description: Adds HOME tab to SF Inventory to set and go to player home point

lucky_block.short_description: Craft and break lucky blocks to give something good, bad or painful :)

pink_lava.short_description: Adds pink lava to certain depth of map with new mahogany obsidian block

teleport_potion.short_description: Adds craftable teleport potions (throwable) and teleport pads.

bakedclay.short_description: Adds the ability to bake clay into blocks and colour them with dye.

dmobs.short_description: Release many new Dragons, Monsters and Animals into your world.

mobs.short_description: Simple and feature rich API to quickly add mobs into your world.

pova.short_description: Gives mod makers a set of functions to safely apply player physics overrides.

bows.short_description: Adds bows and arrows to game. Fork of the mod by AiTechEye

invisibility.short_description: Craft a potion to make yourself invisible

pbj_pup.short_description: Adds PB&J Pup, Nyan Cats or MooGnu into your world

hopper.short_description: Adds hoppers to transport items between chests/furnace etc.

periodic_elements.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds the periodic elements

leef_filesystem.short_description: adds dependencies for binary file reading, as well as other file utilities. Orignally from Modlib

scriptblocks2.short_description: Adds nodes that can be used to build reusable programs.

cave_lighting.short_description: Add two chatcommands to automatically light up dark places (e.g. caves) with lighting nodes such as torches.

titanium.short_description: Adds titanium which is very strong and lasts for a long time.

we_undo.short_description: Undo and Redo executed WorldEdit chat commands

bookmarks.short_description: Add commands to manage public positions of interest

function_delayer.short_description: Allows executing functions after a delay to reduce possible lag (EDD scheduler?)

aether_new.short_description: Adds a hard to obtain yet powerful substance called Aether.

decraft.short_description: De-craft items with the decrafting workbench.

fakery.short_description: Adds counterfeit diamonds and other fake  precious materials.

hammermod.short_description: Adds a steel hammer which allows to dig 3x3.

fslib.short_description: Formspec string builder & event handler callbacks

cellestiall.short_description: Simulates 3D cellular automata in your entire world. WARNING: you will lose items & buildings in your world.

item_limit.short_description: Limits the amount of items of certain types in player inventories

hud_timers.short_description: A lightweight library for adding hud timers.

guidebooks.short_description: A library for registering functional in-game documentation 'guidebooks'.

decorations_sea.short_description: Adds many new types of seaweed, kelp, corals and other sea decorations, distributed across biomes

technic_diamond.short_description: Use technic to grind and compress diamonds.

dreambuilder_hotbar.short_description: Expands the hotbar to up to 32 slots

illumination.short_description: Makes players emit light while holding any luminescent item.

pick_axe_tweaks.short_description: Adds the ability for pick axes to place light nodes on right click

pipeworks.short_description: Supplies a complete set of nice, round mesh-based water pipes, boxy item-transport tubes, and devices that work with them.

trucraft.short_description: An alternative crafting system done entirely in the world.

spacecannon.short_description: Adds three scifi/space cannons with various projectile-speed and explosion-strength

playerfactions.short_description: A simple mod which allows player created factions. Not very useful on its own, it becomes very powerful when combined with other mods.

xcompat.short_description: Work in Progress. a library that aims to facilitate other mods to be game agnostic by handling sounds and crafting

gadgets_modpack.short_description: A modpack providing full progression of magic and technology-based items that apply status effects or do other useful functions

transporter.short_description: Adds a configurable technic-based transporter, with bookmarks and many options

technic_armor.short_description: Adds armor made from lead, brass, cast iron, carbon steel, stainless steel, tin and silver

new_campfire.short_description: You can craft and use better campfire.

hangglider.short_description: Adds a functional hang glider for exploring

abripanes.short_description: Adds faintly glowing coloured glass panes which can be used for stained glass windows or for gentle lighting.

tmw_slimes.short_description: Adds several types of slimes inspired by TheManaWorld

simple_streetlights.short_description: Adds various streetlight "spawners" (5m tall, supports multiple pole materials and light sources)

mcl_end_portal_bucket.short_description: Adds an easy way to carry the end portal where ever you go in MineClone2.

bweapons_modpack.short_description: A weapons modpack aiming at providing a complete, technologic and magic progression of ranged weapons, along with an API to easily make your own ones.

factory_bridges.short_description: This mod adds a steel bridges, railings and stairs in Minetest.

blox.short_description: Adds lots of differently colored and textured blocks to Minetest.

tntrun.short_description: Players compete to be the last one standing on a layer of falling TNT

alien_material.short_description: Adds new blocks, items, and tools from aliens. A new time begins.

tnttag.short_description: A player is holding TNT which is about to explode; they must tag other players to get rid of it

accuracy.short_description: Accuracy library for mods introducing ranged weapons.

birds.short_description: Adds birds which drop raw chicken upon death

maid_companions.short_description: Work in Progress. Explore the world with cute NPC's!

callbacks_api.short_description: callbacks_api is a framework for registering callbacks if the callback registration function exists, else returns gracefully.

mid_measure.short_description: Quickly get the distance between two nodes and calculate their mid-point

castle.short_description: This is a modpack all about creating castles and castle dungeons.

myboardgames.short_description: This is a modpack with 17 mini games. It includes chess, checkers, connect 4, uno and more.

myitemchest.short_description: A chest that spawns different items

myores.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds ores and minerals to Luanti

batmod.short_description: Fun mod that is about bats

mytreasure.short_description: Adds treasure chests around the world

mysheetmetal.short_description: Gutters, fashia and soffit makes your house look great.

mybricks.short_description: Machine to make bricks out of common material

yl_matterbridge.short_description: Handles chat between Minetest and Matterbridge

yl_canned_food_mtg.short_description: Craft and eat yl_canned_food in mtg

yl_api_nodestages.short_description: An API for nodestages, which convert into other nodes

server_shop.short_description: Shops intended to be set up by server administrators.

glass.short_description: Enhances default glass to make it colorable.

sounds.short_description: A set of free sounds & API.

scanner.short_description: Lets you read and write books via digilines

public_death_messages.short_description: Adds toggleable and unique death messages for when a player dies

catrealm.short_description: Adds a cat-themed dimension with unique ores and over-powered tools

nc_nature.short_description: Updated, fixed, enhanced edition of Winter94's NodeCore Nature

marinaramobs.short_description: adds mobs to the marinara oceans

livingjungle.short_description: Adds a new type of dense jungle biome to your world

moretorches.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds new types of torches and lamps

livingcaves.short_description: Work in Progress. Adds more life to the caves of your world

animalworld.short_description: Adds various wild animals to your Minetest Game world.

wilhelminessounds.short_description: Adds ambient sounds to the landscapes of Living Floatlands, Living Desert, Living Jungle, Living Caves and Natural Biomes

subterrane.short_description: A mod that creates vast underground caverns and allows biomes to be defined for them

dynamic_liquid.short_description: Flowing dynamic liquids and ocean-maintenance springs.

hopper.short_description: Adds hoppers to transport items between chests/furnace etc.

castle_lighting.short_description: This mod contains medieval castle lighting solutions

castle_weapons.short_description: Provides several medieval weapons for use around castles

commoditymarket_fantasy.short_description: Adds a number of fantasy-themed marketplaces using commoditymarket

extra_wool_stuff.short_description: Adds more wool items and nodes

custom_chat_prefixes.short_description: Adds Custom Chat Prefixes, you can choose a prefix and colour.

public_tp.short_description: Allows players to create, manage and use public teleport places.

inventory_admin.short_description: Enables admins to manage the inventory of players.

proposals.short_description: Adds proposing and voting on server changes

beds.short_description: A complete rewrite of the Beds mod with many additional features

bitwise.short_description: A pure-Lua implementation of common bit-manipulation functions

console.short_description: Provides an in-game HUD to easily monitor debug output

trophies.short_description: Showcase player achievements with a personalized gold cup

finder.short_description: Extends the Minetest API with search capabilities for entities

belfry.short_description: Adds a set of church bells that are chimed automatically at different periods.

inspector.short_description: An in-game tool to inspect node parameters and metadata.

emote.short_description: Provides player emotes and an api to make the player model sit, lie down and perform other actions.

fsc.short_description: Easier method for creating better and more secure formspecs.

frame.short_description: A stylish item and node frame that causes no lag/server load.

bucket.short_description: Bucket - fork of Minetest Game mod with reduced "bucket" liquid flowing

doc_basics.short_description: Adds some help texts explaining how to use Luanti.

dice2.short_description: Decorative dice blocks which face a random direction.

bedrock2.short_description: Adds an indestructable bedrock layer at the bottom of the world.

doc.short_description: A simple in-game documentation system which enables mods to add help entries based on templates.

spawnbuilder.short_description: Generates a stone platform below the world origin or static spawn point.

moreblocks.short_description: adds various blocks to the game

bucket.short_description: a bucket which functions like a normal tool.

scaffolding.short_description: scaffolding, to help in building projects.

headlamp.short_description: Adds a headlamp that can be worn as armor, providing a bright light source

nyancat_redo.short_description: nyan lazer, nyan soda and sugar. What's not to love?

pathogen.short_description: Anables users to get a pathogen.

palisade.short_description: Add craftable palisades in many styles. Hades Revisited is supported.

chair_lift.short_description: Add craftable and usable chair lift. TIPS: Use gearbox, grease parts (hemp oil), check grease with inspect tool, combine more engines...

moretools.short_description: Add more variant of screwdriver and shears (if vines is enabled).  Add garden trowel tool if composting is enabled.

feed_buckets.short_description: Craftable bucket of feeds which can be used for feed nearby animals.

remove_unknowns.short_description: A small tool to help you clean up your world of unknown-blocks.

modern_house.short_description: Work in Progress. Add decoratives blocks for a modern house

basic_trains.short_description: Collection of basic trains for the Advanced Trains mod. Formerly included in main advtrains modpack (until 2.3.0)

incrediblemaze.short_description: This mod is a maze generator

filterpp.short_description: censors swears in the player chat using the filter++ liberary

hot_air_balloons.short_description: Adds craftable and controllable hot air balloons.

mcl_decor.short_description: Adds more decoration and furniture blocks to VoxeLibre (ex. MineClone2) and Mineclonia

trainpack.short_description: A collection of all train mods based on advtrains which made by various people.

multidecor.short_description: Adds various detailed furniture components, decorations and exterior stuff with various designs and styles of each epoch.

circular_saw_ext.short_description: An extension for the circular saw from the original moreblocks mod adding a big set of new microblocks shapes.

practice_bot.short_description: A Minetest mod that adds customizable practice bots and spawner blocks to help players train their PvP skills. Includes difficulty levels, realistic animations, and unique tools for managing spawners.

composter.short_description: Adds a composter to make dirt out of your leaves.

wesh.short_description: Not only wool! Miniaturizes builds and allows rebuilding them too

rhotator.short_description: A predictable tool to rotate nodes

worm_farm.short_description: Adds a way for worms to be cultivated for fishing - designed for use with Ethereal

gear_up.short_description: A mod that adds wearable gear and allows re-color of items.

statues.short_description: Adds statues of various sizes to the game.

skyboard.short_description: add skyboard flying vehicle with crafting

cozylights.short_description: Early alpha. Improves the way light sources(torches etc) behave and allows to create huge lights, literal projectors with just a mouse click, light map will be computed for you.

dees_balls.short_description: adds fun balls with basic physics, to play (socker, basket ball, and hockey, with!

hedges.short_description: Adds connected hedges that that can be crafted from leaves.

server_news.short_description: Minetest mod to show server news when players join

teleporter_plates.short_description: VoxeLibre Teleporter was created due to Travelnet not completely working in the new VoxeLibre game.

mcl_rubber.short_description: Adds rubber and related Items to MineClone.

mtpoimap.short_description: Displays a map with points of interest, for any game (no dependencies).

australia.short_description: Adds a wide variety of Australia-themed biomes and content

knapping_pack.short_description: Adds knapping mechanics API inspired by Vintage story

fallen_nodes.short_description: Makes dirt, cobble, snow, straw and cactus nodes fall. Fork of Hamlet's fallen_nodes. May be destructive to existing worlds.

digichat.short_description: Adds a block for sending chat messages using Digilines.

exile_rails.short_description: Adding underground rails and trains to Exile

noderoads.short_description: Add much of one-node roads and crossroads, road bridges and slopes

repainter.short_description: Add tools for editing node param2 for different color and different rotation

bens_gear.short_description: Attach tool parts to create new tools and add a whole new layer of strategy to your tool crafting!

subway_tracksides.short_description: Add tracksides for your subway map.

mystical_tools.short_description: tool progression past diamonds and adds mystical staffs and wands

toolranks.short_description: Counts the number of nodes a specific tool has dug

bank_accounts.short_description: Adds bank accounts with ATMs and Debit\Credit cards.

wreckage.short_description: A variety of tools and modifications. There are special blocks for creating, modifying, and repairing tools.

minertrade.short_description: It adds various types of money, exchange table, Dispensing Machines, ATMs in stores.

caverealms.short_description: A mod for Minetest to add underground realms.

mcl_backpack.short_description: Add additional backpack inventory to players

w_api.short_description: Adds an API to easily register custom weapons

chat_guide.short_description: A virtual assistant that helps players with tips, guides, and useful information.

super_foods.short_description: Adds many new foods, such as cake, watermelon, coconut, and cheese! You can even play in Survival!

autoclimb.short_description: Adds autoclimb, idea by mrdraxs and code by ( FatalError, once again seasoned ) and ( ElCeejo ).

copy_from_chest.short_description: Adds server command copy-from-chest that copies items from chest at x y z to player.

minebase.short_description: Adds APIs and new dynamic functionalities.

toolsfx.short_description: Adds sounds to tools like swords and axes when using them

instant_ores.short_description: A tool for registering entire materials, complete with ore generation, tool-sets and automatically generated sprites with almost no effort required

steel_bar_blocks.short_description: adds blocks made of steel bars (xpanes)

fragments.short_description: A mapgen with a goal, with things needed to advance to the next level.

tieless_tracks.short_description: Tracks without crossties for Advanced Trains (advtrains) that can be used on streets and other related things

hbsprint.short_description: A flexible sprint mod supporting stamina, hunger and monoids.

item_drop.short_description: This mod adds Minecraft like drop/pick up of items to Minetest.

soup.short_description: A mod that adds a few new food items.

afkkick.short_description: Kick players who do not move for a while

shadows.short_description: Adds sunlight shadows to your world

k_ambient_light.short_description: Pseudo ambient lighting to banish the deep dark night. Allows a few extra granular tweaks and override options.

mt_build_easy.short_description: A handy tool allowing the creation of large structures with minimal effort (in survival!).

get_3d_slope.short_description: A lib that calculates the average 3d slope of surrounding nodes from a position and raduis.

punch_and_place_particles.short_description: Makes satisfying particles when placing a node or punching one. (viewable by all players)

stalker.short_description: Adds a scary and strong monster that lives in caves

aqua_world.short_description: Generate an underwater world with deep water, sand, and sandstone.

candy.short_description: Adds candy which you can make from candy ores.

itemshelf.short_description: Generic item shelf with 3D items on display

nofloatingfallingblocks.short_description: Registers an abm to not leave falling blocks floating

waste.short_description: Adds Waste and ways to recycle it into useful resources

resource_crops_evolved.short_description: Adds new recipes for Resource Crops to make a progression through them possible

bulldozer.short_description: Driveable bulldozer for pushing nodes and flattening ground

explorertoolsall.short_description: Tools place item in next inventory slot on right click

wetmud.short_description: Hydrates farmland without using water directly

turtleminer.short_description: A Mod to let Kids start programming with a turtle that can move around in the world, and dig and build what the user wants.

size_editer.short_description: Change your size with size_editer and become small and big and Microscopic too

sailing.short_description: Live in a tropical paradise where you can sail, mine coconuts, etc.

splink.short_description: Adds items that can store massive amounts of other items in your inventory

simple_working_villages.short_description: An updated Fork of Working Villages, including new characters and a Mayor

willadmin.short_description: Tools for server admins to ban and kick bad players.

spawn_command.short_description: Adds a /spawn command that teleports you to the server spawn command.

pegasus.short_description: Adds unique and consistantly designed legendary flying horses - Pegasi

emeraldbank.short_description: Keep your Emeralds in a Bank, a complete economy API

bones.short_description: Bones mod reworked (works in MineClonia or MinetestGame)

admin_toys.short_description: Tools for admins to have fun with cheating and otherwise rule-breaking players

ebiomes_dyes.short_description: Deprecated because after ebiomes v1.5.0, dye recipes are included by default, making this unnecessary. Adds dye recipes for the flowers from Extra Biomes.

unified_inventory_themes.short_description: Adds a new theme to the unified_inventory. Support for multiple themes may come later.

inventory_overflow.short_description: If main is full, place nodes into the next available inventory

vein_miner.short_description: Automatically mines ore veins and trees while sneaking

real_world_time.short_description: Syncs the time in-game with the real-world time.

ns_minerals_core.short_description: An API for automatically registering recipes, nodes and ore generation.

screwdriver2.short_description: A more intuitive node rotation tool

ski.short_description: Go skiing, and have fun, and save your winter holidys

nucleotest.short_description: Battle Royale-like game. Provides an API and a reference implementation. Highly radioactive. Work in progress.

nomap.short_description: Reject tradition, embrace modernity.  For those tired of default MTG maps.  Crafting recipes for TechAge hackers available.

mcl2_clocks.short_description: just an adjustable redstone clock, thanks to neocraft1293

electrica.short_description: A mod that adds machines and tools also ores, items, etc

lakemaker.short_description: A TNT block that makes lakes/bodies of water.

usable_nodes.short_description: Adds usable nodes, such as kill block, or move block.

bridgemaker.short_description: A refillable machine to easily create simple block bridges across caverns and valleys.

pvp_control.short_description: Allow players to set their own ability to hurt or be hurt in PvP, by chat command or by pressure pads. Nametag colour changes to reflect status.

floating_anchor.short_description: ExtraUtilities' Angel Block for Minecraft in Minetest! Place structures in mid-air with ease.

lift_on_joinplayer.short_description: Lift player up on login until he has no air block under his legs.

timeday.short_description: Display current time and days since start on bottom right of screen.

hardtrees.short_description: Require tools to break trees and introduce beginner-tier rock tools.

technic_elepower_compat.short_description: Elepower recipes for Technic machines. Technic recipes for Elepower machines. A new converter connects Technic cables to Elepower conduits when enabled.

corroded_metal.short_description: Metal can rust when next to water. Restore it with acid from underground.

horadric_cube.short_description: An artifact that can transmute items

death_timer.short_description: This will force players to wait a specified amount of time on death.

cartographer_minetest_game.short_description: Adds regional maps that you can craft and place (Minetest Game version)

forfun.short_description: Craft a wand with which you can cast a lightning spell. Great for discovering caves.

luaatc_textline.short_description: Improved textlines with integrated LuaATC component

standart_textures.short_description: Work in Progress. A 2D texturepack, made with gimp

pink_details.short_description: Makes various color blocks and tools to pink. If you like pink, this is for you!

wintercore_dark.short_description: Dark and bold textures for NodeCore by WintersKnight94

wintercore_thra.short_description: 32x32 Nodecore textures Inspired by the world of Thra, from The Dark Crystal.

good_morning_craft.short_description: A simple yet quirky texture pack by Louis Durrant

outline_square_crosshair.short_description: It replaces the + and X crosshair to the outline square crosshair.

aephorus.short_description: Simple, pixelish, cartoonish and vibrant texture pack.

simplepixel.short_description: Work in Progress. SimplePixel is a texturepack, inspired by on MC Promo Art/Barebones Texturepack. This texturepack is simple, yet elegant.

12345.short_description: Wilhelmines Texture Pack – Inspired by the colors of Nature!

mcl_tf2.short_description: Adds clean and recognizable TF2 textures to your world.

broken_textures.short_description: Reality fractures into a looping anomaly, leaving only a distorted echo of what once was.

default_grid.short_description: Add grid overlay to MT Game 5.0 default textures.

voxels_reworked.short_description: Work in Progress. A texture pack that iterates on the Pixel Perfection texture pack by XSSheep for the VoxeLibre game.

lessdirt.short_description: Adjusts textures so rolling hills have less exposed bare dirt.

vilja_pix_2.short_description: A sophisticated texture pack for Luanti.

pixelperfection.short_description: A perfect texture pack by Hugh "XSSheep" Rutland

ctf_hctc.short_description: Makes it easier to tell the team color of a player in the Capture the Flag game.

sharpnet_textures.short_description: It's Photo Realism pack with few mod support.

realism_512.short_description: A ultra realistic  texture pack that has just been created and will improve (send comments and your opinion)

baby_sun.short_description: Makes the sun a cartoon shape with a baby face in the middle

pixelbox.short_description: Its design in a 16-bit ratio and broad range of colors and depth.

ambiguity.short_description: The default TP for Minetest Game, using greyscale

better_basic_materials.short_description: Fixes the inconsistent textures in Basic Materials.

refined_textures.short_description: Attempts to recapture a similar aesthetic to "Minecraft", a fork of REFI_Textures to remove all the weird emphasis on cyan colors.

tweaks_for_ctf.short_description: Simplistic texturepack for ctf based on WINNI's miner16px made for visibility , performance and good looks .

farming_cv.short_description: overrides farming_redo's textures w/ the ones from cucina_vegana

peaceful_pixels_ctf.short_description: A version of Peaceful Pixels made for CTF (with landmines support!)

realfantasy.short_description: A Texture Pack that combines realistic and fantastic elements. (compatible with VoxeLibre and Minetest Game)
